languages.text: Время беззакония, объявленное Вольным Торговцем, превратило Футфол в гнездо порока. Мирные торговцы не могли найти место для швартовки среди пиратских кораблей, продавцы больше не трудились вытереть кровь прежних владельцев со своего товара. Имперский флот трижды предпринимал попытки очистить Футфол и каждый раз уходил от станции с тяжелыми потерями.
languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в хаос

languages.text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.
languages.original_text: Время беззакония, объявленное Вольным Торговцем, превратило Футфол в гнездо порока. Мирные торговцы не могли найти место для швартовки среди пиратских кораблей, продавцы больше не трудились вытереть кровь прежних владельцев со своего товара. Имперский флот трижды предпринимал попытки очистить Футфол и каждый раз уходил от станции с тяжелыми потерями.

traits.locale_text: The time of iniquity, declared by the Rogue Trader, turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful merchants could not find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and vendors were not bothering with cleaning bloodstains left by previous owners from the goods. The Imperial Navy tried to clear Footfall three times from this bane, and every time it retreated from the stations with heavy losses.

The time of iniquity, declared by the Rogue Trader, turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful merchants could not find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and vendors were not bothering with cleaning bloodstains left by previous owners from the goods. The Imperial Navy tried to clear Footfall three times from this bane, and every time it retreated from the stations with heavy losses.

Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants could not be bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

languages.text: 行商浪人开创的邪恶时代将落脚港变成了堕落的巢穴。那些爱好和平的交易者几乎无法在海盗船之间找到停泊的地方，而那些海盗甚至都懒得擦掉他们不义之财上的血迹。帝国海军曾三次试图将落脚港从这样的祸患中解救出来，但每次都损失惨重。
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人开创的邪恶时代将落脚港变成了堕落的巢穴。那些爱好和平的交易者几乎无法在海盗船之间找到停泊的地方，而那些海盗甚至都懒得擦掉他们不义之财上的血迹。帝国海军曾三次试图将落脚港从这样的祸患中解救出来，但每次都损失惨重。

languages.text: Die Zeit der Frevel, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausrief, verwandelte Footfall in einen Hort der Verkommenheit. Friedliche Händler konnten kaum einen Platz finden, um zwischen den Piratenschiffen anzudocken, und Kaufleute machten sich nicht mal mehr die Mühe, das Blut von ihren illegal erworbenen Waren zu wischen. Die imperiale Kriegsflotte versuchte drei Mal, Footfall von dieser Geißel zu befreien, musste sich aber jedes Mal mit schweren Verlusten zurückziehen.
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: Die Zeit der Frevel, die {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ausrief, verwandelte Footfall in einen Hort der Verkommenheit. Friedliche Händler konnten kaum einen Platz finden, um zwischen den Piratenschiffen anzudocken, und Kaufleute machten sich nicht die Mühe, das Blut von ihren illegal erworbenen Waren zu wischen. Die imperiale Kriegsflotte versuchte drei Mal, Footfall von dieser Geißel zu befreien, musste sich aber jedes Mal mit schweren Verlusten zurückziehen.

languages.text: L'ère d'iniquité déclarée par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} transforma Castel en véritable antre de vilenie. Les marchands pacifiques ne parvenaient plus à trouver où s'amarrer au milieu de tous les vaisseaux pirates, tandis que leurs homologues sans scrupules ne prenaient même plus le temps d'essuyer le sang sur les marchandises qu'ils avaient dérobées. La Marine Impériale tenta de libérer Castel de ce fléau par trois fois, mais subit à chacune de ces occasions de terribles pertes.
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: L'ère d'iniquité déclarée par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} transforma Castel en véritable antre de vilénie. Les marchands pacifiques ne parvenaient plus à trouver où s’amarrer au milieu de tous les vaisseaux pirates, tandis que leurs homologues sans scrupules ne prenaient même plus le temps d'essuyer le sang sur les marchandises qu'ils avaient dérobées. La Marine Impériale tenta de libérer Castel de ce fléau par trois fois, mais subit à chacune de ces occasions de terribles pertes.

languages.text: La época de inmoralidad declarada por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente convirtió a Paso en un foco de depravación. Los comerciantes pacíficos apenas podían encontrar lugar para aterrizar con tantas naves piratas, y los mercaderes ya ni se molestaban en limpiar la sangre de su mercancía robada. La Armada Imperial trató de liberar a Paso de ese destino tres veces, y todas ellas tuvo que retirarse con graves pérdidas.
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: La época de inmoralidad declarada por {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente convirtió a Paso en un foco de depravación. Los comerciantes pacíficos apenas podían encontrar lugar para aterrizar con tantas naves piratas, y los mercaderes ni se molestaban en limpiar la sangre de su mercancía robada. La Armada Imperial trató de liberar a Paso de ese destino tres veces, y todas ellas tuvo que retirarse con graves pérdidas.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が宣言した不義の時代は、フットフォールを堕落の巣に変えた。平和的な商人たちは海賊船の中に停泊する場所をほとんど見つけることもできず、不正に手に入れた品物の血を拭い去ることすらしなくなった。帝国海軍はフットフォールをこの災厄から解放しようと3度試みたが、そのたびに大きな損害を出して撤退する羽目になった。
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が宣言した不義の時代は、フットフォールを堕落の巣に変えた。平和的な商人たちは海賊船の中に停泊する場所をほとんど見つけることもできず、不正に手に入れた品物の血を拭い去ることすらしなくなった。帝国海軍はフットフォールをこの災厄から解放しようと3度試みたが、そのたびに大きな損害を出して撤退する羽目になった。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in başlattığı günahkârlık çağı, Binliman'ı bir ahlaksızlık yuvasına çevirdi. Barış içinde gelen tacirler, korsan gemilerinden kendilerine yanaşacak yer bulamaz, tüccarlar artık şaibeli mallarının üzerindeki kanı temizlemeye zahmet etmez oldu. İmparatorluk Donanması, Binliman'ı bu çöküşten kurtarmayı üç kez denese de her seferinde ağır kayıplar vererek geri çekilmek zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: The time of iniquity declared by the Rogue Trader turned Footfall into a nest of depravity. Peaceful traders could hardly find a place to dock among the pirate ships, and merchants no longer even bothered to wipe the blood from their ill-gotten goods. The Imperial Navy tried to free Footfall from this bane three times, each time retreating with heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in ilan ettiği tanrısızlık çağı Binliman'ı bir ahlaksızlık yuvasına çevirdi. Barış içinde gelen tacirler, korsan gemilerinden kendilerine yanaşacak yer bulamıyor, tüccarlar artık şaibeli mallarının üzerindeki kanı temizlemeye bile zahmet etmiyorlardı. İmparatorluk Donanması, Binliman'ı bu çöküşten kurtarmayı üç kez denedi ve her seferinde de ağır kayıplar vererek geri çekilmek zorunda kaldı.

languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в хаос
